author: Reuters Editorial
title: Zona euro, stima preliminare crescita trim4 in linea attese Macroeconomia
text: BRUSSELS, Feb 14 (Reuters) - Euro zone gross domestic product (GDP) grew 0.6 percent in the fourth quarter of 2017, data from the European statistics agency Eurostat showed on Wednesday. (percentage change) 2017 EURO ZONE Q4 POLL Q3 Q2 Q1 pct change q/q 0.6 0.6* 0.7 0.7 0.6 pct change y/y 2.7 2.7** 2.8 2.4 2.1 EUROPEAN UNION pct change q/q 0.6 0.7 0.7 0.6 pct change y/y 2.6 2.8 2.5 2.2 * Reuters poll of 48 economists, range 0.6 to 0.7 pct ** Reuters poll of 37 economists, range 2.5 to 2.8 pct For Eurostat release, click on: here
